title: Dhaka Division
description: The capital division, where the largest population resides. Your contributions here can help thousands.

title: Chittagong Division
description: A coastal area with a diverse population. Help us provide warm clothing to those living by the sea.

title: Khulna Division
description: Located in the southwest, Khulna faces severe winters. Your donation can bring warmth to many families.

title: Rajshahi Division
description: A central division with both urban and rural areas. Your donations can help those in need across the region.

title: Barisal Division
description: Barisal is a low-lying region with colder temperatures in the winter. Help us bring warmth to this area.

title: Sylhet Division
description: A mountainous division known for its chilly winters. Your donations will help many in the colder regions.
